topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547bef0c63687265b5070000#post_547bef0c63687265b5070000
[bq="Twisty"]!http://i.imgur.com/l5xPj9f.png!

and then i became a mod[/bq]
I know you probably don't want to hear about it, *BUT* it's pretty obvious what you're talking about especially with your avatar, who particle mare is and such making it obvious you're talking about kym and gamergate.  The thing is gamergate is probably going end in the next couple months, because basically the social justice warrior movement has lost the vast majority of their members and pretty much the only people left in anti-gg, other than the people who are anti-gg because of they dislike things that are popular or things that in their mind are "too popular" or such(I know you fall in this category), are in the immediate clique of those involved.  The overwhelming majority of people who are still following prominent sjw members are just there to watch the show.

Tl:dr; In three or so months you will never have to hear about Anita Sarkeesian this or Zoe Quinn that or McIntosh that because they and their movement is rapidly being forced into obscurity.

Basically I know you like trolling pro-gamergate on kym, but chances are you'll never have to hear about drama about sjw again because the sjw movement isn't necessarily dying, but rather they sjw movement being forced into obscurity.
